title: how do you find out your mmr?
body:
how do you find out your mmr?is there any way to? the games ive been having are just absolutely terrible and as a result my enjoyment factor and confidence in lane has gone out the window. I wanna see if my mmr is low as fk to see if it is even worth playing ranked.

plz halp

replies.body:
There isn't a way to see your Riot Certified MMR, but you can use any of the MMR calculators

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=CHEESYLEEKS

click check MMR and you can see what sort of MMR you have.

As for your rough rank, you look like you're sitting around Bronze 2/3
